column2: All of the ANL Great Works will appear.
Only the historical ANL Great Works will appear. NOTE: This will disable the mythical cities quest chains AND the corresponding mythical artifacts.
None of the ANL Great Works will appear.
All of the ANL artifacts will appear.
None of the ANL artifacts will apppear.
Crusades, Jihads, and Great Holy Wars will not be changed from vanilla.
Crusades, Jihads, and Great Holy Wars will ALL be available from the beginning of the game.
